titleInfo.title: FINANCIAL INSTITUTION CUSTOMER PROTECTION ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: FINANCIAL INSTITUTION CUSTOMER PROTECTION ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 201

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestCategory2: Financial Institution Customer Protection Act of 2017
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 2706, amended, to provide requirements for the appropriate Federal banking agencies when requesting or ordering a depository institution to terminate a specific customer account, to provide for additional requirements related to subpoenas issued under the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay vote of 395 yeas to 2 nays, Roll No. 672;

titleInfo.title: PROTECTING RELIGIOUSLY AFFILIATED INSTITUTIONS ACT OF 2017

extension.searchTitle: PROTECTING RELIGIOUSLY AFFILIATED INSTITUTIONS ACT OF 2017; Congressional Record Vol. 163, No. 201

congVote.result: So (two-thirds being in the affirmative) the rules were suspended and the bill, as amended, was passed.
congVote.dailyDigestSummary: The House agreed to suspend the rules and pass the following measures:<P/>H.R. 1730, amended, to amend title 18, United States Code, to provide for the protection of community centers with religious affiliation, by a \2/3\ yea-and-nay of 402 yeas to 2 nays, Roll No. 673.
